title: J.P. Morgan Wealth Management Ranks #1 in J.D. Power Digital Experience Study
content: The firm leads competitors in self-directed and full-service investor satisfaction in website and app

title: J.P. Morgan unveils expanded ‘what’s next’ list for experiences and books
content: J.P. Morgan’s NextList2025 offers comprehensive array of new opportunities for the year ahead

title: J.P. Morgan Launches Private Markets Data Solutions for Institutional Investors
content: Fusion by J.P. Morgan releases a new suite of private markets data services that delivers standardized data aggregated from multiple vendors and sources, allowing investors to analyze their complete portfolio across private and publicly traded holdings.

title: JPMorganChase reports third quarter 2024 financial results
content: JPMorganChase reports first-quarter 2024 net income of $12.9 billion, or $4.37 per share.

title: J.P. Morgan Payments expands Oracle partnership to streamline payments across treasury, trade and commerce
content: J.P. Morgan Payments and Oracle enhance existing cloud enterprise resource planning (ERP) integration with new solutions across Oracle platforms.

title: J.P. Morgan Payments and PopID to expand biometric offerings
content: J.P. Morgan Payments announced an expanded relationship with PopID to deploy in-store, pay-by-face biometric payment solutions for U.S.-based merchants.

title: JPMorganChase reports second quarter 2024 financial results
content: JPMorganChase reports first-quarter 2024 net income of $18.1 billion, or $6.12 per share.

title: J.P. Morgan and Sephora extend tap to pay on iPhone to Canada
content: Chase Payment Solutions, a part of J.P. Morgan Payments, now gives merchants in Canada the ability to more seamlessly accept in-person, contactless payments made using an iPhone

title: J.P. Morgan launches enhanced data normalization solution for institutional investors
content: Fusion by J.P. Morgan releases a new managed data service for institutional investors to optimize their operating models by delivering consistent data, across diverse sources and domains, accessible through cloud-native channels and a single semantic layer.

title: J.P. Morgan presents its 25th annual summer reading list
content: Celebrating the list’s 25 years — and JPMorgan Chase’s 225-year history — with an Anniversary Spotlight

title: JPMorganChase opens the doors of its new Glasgow office
content: Firm welcomes employees at its new state-of-the-art technology home in the heart of Glasgow’s Finance District. With a 100% focus on technology, it provides software development facilities to the firm and its clients worldwide.

title: 2023 ESG report
content: This ESG report is designed to consolidate and summarize our work on ESG topics that are important to our business and stakeholders and to guide readers to where they can access more detailed information about specifc topics of interest. All data in this report is as of December 31, 2023, unless otherwise noted.

title: JPMorganChase reports first quarter 2024 financial results
content: JPMorganChase reports first-quarter 2024 net income of $13.4 billion, or $4.44 per share.

title: 2023 Annual Report
content: "The strength of our company has allowed us to always be there for clients, governments and communities — in good times and in bad times — and this strength has enabled us to continually invest in building our business for the future. - Jamie Dimon"

title: J.P. Morgan becomes principal member of Cartes Bancaires CB,  France’s leading payment network
content:
•	J.P. Morgan plans to support the French payment method for merchant clients by end of 2024
•	First U.S. bank to hold principal membership

title: JPMorganChase reports fourth quarter 2023 financial results
content: JPMorganChase reports fourth-quarter 2023 net income of $9.3 billion, or $3.04 per share.
